div.p: This code system http://ibm.com/fhir/cdm/CodeSystem/paid-in-network-indicator defines the following codes:

tr.td: In Network; Provider is contracted with the health insurance company to provide services to plan members for specific pre-negotiated rates.
Out of Network; Provider is not contracted with the health insurance company to provide services to plan members for specific pre-negotiated rates.

description.value: An indicator of whether the claim was paid at the in-network or out-of-network level.

definition.value: In Network; Provider is contracted with the health insurance company to provide services to plan members for specific pre-negotiated rates.
Out of Network; Provider is not contracted with the health insurance company to provide services to plan members for specific pre-negotiated rates.
